text: If this isn't the best place to post this kind of thing please let me know... I find myself with some spare time for, uh, hopefully not too many months, so if anyone has some data-intensive (especially metadata-intensive, data lake, or streaming) projects they'd like some help/advice with, I'd like to hear about it :slightly_smiling_face:
